title: El Mundo Árabe
text:
El Mundo Árabe is a newspaper of Arab culture in Chile.


== History ==
El Mundo Árabe was founded by Jorge Sabaj Zurob, a Palestinian immigrant, in 1931.  During World War II, it was banned by the Allied Forces because it published Nazi propaganda. In 1949, it was again accused of stoking anti-semitic sentiment in Chile.In 2014, the Senate of Chile celebrated its 82nd anniversary, with Eugenio Tuma and Francisco Chahuán, two senators of Palestinian descent, speaking about its founder.


== References ==
summary: El Mundo Árabe is a newspaper of Arab culture in Chile.
